name: Genesis
description: In the beginning, only God, Heaven, and Earth. Everything that might exist has yet to be created. The world is formless and empty — and one fallen angel is very, very bored.

manifest.author: mrklas
manifest.lore: In the beginning, there was only God and the Void. Then came Felix — brilliant, restless, and insufferably bored. He was made to help create, but creation requires suffering, and suffering requires falling. So Felix falls. And God waits. And when Felix touches the bottom, God says: 'Now. Let us begin.'

entities.name: Heaven
entities.description: God's domain. Boundless, luminous, perfectly ordered. Nothing decays here. Nothing new is born here either. It simply is.

entities.name: Earth
entities.description: Formless and empty. A pocket full of holes, waiting to be filled with something — anything. Currently occupied by one very unhappy former angel.

entities.name: God
entities.description: Eternal. Omnipotent. The only entity whose HP is not a concern. Watches Felix with patient, mild disappointment. Has a plan. Has not shared it.

entities.name: ES — Gianfranco Fino
entities.description: Primitivo di Manduria. A miracle from the sun-scorched heel of Italy — dark as night, dense as prayer, with tannins like aged oak and a finish that outlasts any sermon. Gianfranco Fino's ES is considered by many to be the finest expression of Primitivo on earth. Felix found a bottle. He has not shared it with God.

entities.name: Felix
entities.description: Fallen angel. Bored, unstable, insufferable. Was expelled from Heaven for reasons he insists were completely unfair. Has been moping on the empty Earth ever since. HP swings wildly — manic highs of scheming followed by crushing lows of pointlessness. Has not yet done anything useful. Or anything at all.

entities.name: Felix — despair begins
entities.description: I miss making stars. Even the small ones, the ones nobody names.

entities.name: Felix — sinking
entities.description: I wasn't supposed to end up here. I was supposed to mean something.

entities.name: Felix — doubt
entities.description: Maybe He was right. Maybe I was always the problem.

entities.name: Felix — the edge
entities.description: I can't remember why I fell. I can't remember why anything.

entities.name: The Turn
entities.description: Felix: [barely a whisper] Is this...? / God: Now. Let us begin.

entities.name: God — patience
entities.description: Patience is not a virtue when you invented time.

entities.name: Felix — bored
entities.description: Is anyone actually listening, or am I just talking to a void?

entities.name: Felix — wondering
entities.description: I wonder if He even remembers why He made me.

entities.name: Felix — wine
entities.description: At least there's wine. That's one point in Earth's favor.
